metadata.name: Noza Crystal #1
metadata.description: Noza is the heartbeat of the Cornerstone metaverse, transporting energy, knowledge, and life throughout this new world. This powerful force permeates every corner of Cornerstone, sustaining and nourishing all expressive life in it. The Noza Crystals, of which there are only 200 in existence, are pure manifestations of this energy. Each crystal is imbued with incredible potential, giving its holder the power to witness and experience the full wonders of Cornerstone.
